Title: A Walk in the Woods
Writer: Michael Arndt (screenplay), Bill Holderman (screenplay), Bill Bryson (book)
Actors: Robert Redford, Nick Nolte, Emma Thompson, Mary Steenburgen
Plot: After spending two decades in England, Bill Bryson (Robert Redford) returns to the U.S., where he decides the best way to connect with his homeland is to hike the Appalachian Trail with one of his oldest friends, Stephen Katz (Nick Nolte).
